#summary The brief summary of program's functionality:

*Current*:
  * very easy to use construction of logic trees that are described in [FurtherReading Dettmer's manual] 
  * graphical features, such as
    * node colouring,
    * automatic numbering of nodes
    * un-overlapping of nodes 
  * export to JPEG/PNG files
  * grouping of nodes

*Planned*:
  * automatic layout of nodes for production of more concise diagram
  * guided construction of the logic trees
  * [http://code.google.com/p/jthinker/issues/list anything you can suggest]
